Great torrent, works fine, lots of seeders, now including myself ;) 

Anybody who was a bit confused like myself, don't put the seed in the initially extracted folder, install the program fully, THEN replace the 'Audition.exe' file in your programfiles/adobe/audition folder with the crack file in the CRACK folder.

 Quick question: What's the point of disallowing the program internet access? I couldn't seem to access my firewall's settings for specific programs, but the program seems to work dandy.

Nevermind, figured out the internet connection. I'm assuming disabling it is to block verification of authenticity. If anyone else is wondering, open firewall with advanced security, and find the program (or create a new rule and select it) and then click disable connections. SIMPLE
so I'm not gettin it..I got windows xp..after I click save, its like I have this file that I have to pair up with another program to open..what do I do?

Whoa. Thank you grimreaper420! I'm just a teenager and I managed to install it successfully! THANK YOU SO MUCH. To all the other people having problems, open "setup" folder, then double click "Audition3_EFGJSI_Trial" to start setting up. Then a new folder will be made somewhere in your computer (in my case, the folder's name is "adobe" located in my desktop) I click it then I double click "Audition 3.0 Setup" to run the actual installation. When it is done, I go to "C:" then "Program Files" then "Adobe" then "Adobe Audition". I copy "Audition" file from the Crack folder to the folder in the Program Files, then I click yes when asked the permission to replace the original "Audition" file in Program Files. Then DONE. I double click the "Audition" application. It loads, then there you have it. A complete version of Adobe Audition brought to us by grimreaper420. :) Sorry if my instructions aren't that clear, but I hope you get it, so.. ENJOY! ĂÂź
